sql.isNotEmpty: u.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID in (select a.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID from DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL a where a.DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG# $PRD_NOQuery$ group by a.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID)
u.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID in (select a.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID from DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL a where a.DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG# $PRD_NAMEQuery$ group by a.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID)
u.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID in (select a.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID from DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL a where a.DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG# $PRD_NOQuery$ group by a.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID)
u.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID in (select a.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID from DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL a where a.DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG# $PRD_NAMEQuery$ group by a.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID)

sqlMap.sql: select u.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID, u.STOREIN_NOTICE_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_ID, u.SEND_CHANN_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.DEF_STORE_ID, u.DEF_STORE_NO, u.DEF_STORE_NAME, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.FROM_TYPE from DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE u

select u.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID, u.STOREIN_NOTICE_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_ID, u.SEND_CHANN_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.DEF_STORE_ID, u.DEF_STORE_NO, u.DEF_STORE_NAME, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.FROM_TYPE from DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE u
select count(0) cnt FROM DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE u
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE( STOREIN_NOTICE_ID, DEF_STORE_ID, RECV_CHANN_ID, SEND_CHANN_ID, FROM_BILL_ID, FROM_BILL_NO, STOREIN_NOTICE_NO, BILL_TYPE, SEND_CHANN_NO, SEND_CHANN_NAME, RECV_CHANN_NO, RECV_CHANN_NAME, DEF_STORE_NO, DEF_STORE_NAME, REMARK, CRE_NAME, CREATOR, CRE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, STATE, DEL_FLAG, FROM_TYPE, STOREIN_TIME )values( #STOREIN_NOTICE_ID#, #DEF_STORE_ID#, #RECV_CHANN_ID#, #SEND_CHANN_ID#, #FROM_BILL_ID#, #FROM_BILL_NO#, #STOREIN_NOTICE_NO#, #BILL_TYPE#, #SEND_CHANN_NO#, #SEND_CHANN_NAME#, #RECV_CHANN_NO#, #RECV_CHANN_NAME#, #DEF_STORE_NO#, #DEF_STORE_NAME#, #REMARK#, #CRE_NAME#, #CREATOR#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #STATE#, #DEL_FLAG#, #FROM_TYPE#, to_date(#STOREIN_TIME#,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE
DEF_STORE_ID = #DEF_STORE_ID# RECV_CHANN_ID = #RECV_CHANN_ID# SEND_CHANN_ID = #SEND_CHANN_ID# FROM_BILL_ID = #FROM_BILL_ID# FROM_BILL_NO = #FROM_BILL_NO# STOREIN_NOTICE_ID = #STOREIN_NOTICE_ID# STOREIN_NOTICE_NO = #STOREIN_NOTICE_NO# BILL_TYPE = #BILL_TYPE# SEND_CHANN_NO = #SEND_CHANN_NO# SEND_CHANN_NAME = #SEND_CHANN_NAME# RECV_CHANN_NO = #RECV_CHANN_NO# RECV_CHANN_NAME = #RECV_CHANN_NAME# DEF_STORE_NO = #DEF_STORE_NO# DEF_STORE_NAME = #DEF_STORE_NAME# AUDIT_ID = #AUDIT_ID# AUDIT_NAME = #AUDIT_NAME# AUDIT_TIME = sysdate REMARK = #REMARK# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_TIME = sysdate STATE = #STATE# FROM_TYPE = #FROM_TYPE# STOREIN_TIME = to_date(#STOREIN_TIME#,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS')
where STOREIN_NOTICE_ID = #STOREIN_NOTICE_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where STOREIN_NOTICE_ID = #STOREIN_NOTICE_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID, u.STOREIN_NOTICE_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_ID, u.SEND_CHANN_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.DEF_STORE_ID, u.DEF_STORE_NO, u.DEF_STORE_NAME, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.FROM_TYPE, to_char(u.STOREIN_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS')STOREIN_TIME from DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE u where u.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID = #STOREIN_NOTICE_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL_ID, u.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID, u.STOREIN_STORE_ID, u.STOREIN_STORE_NO, u.STOREIN_STORE_NAME, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.PRICE, u.DECT_RATE, u.DECT_PRICE, u.NOTICE_NUM, u.DECT_AMOUNT, u.DEL_FLAG, u.REMARK, a.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, u.SPCL_TECH_ID, u.SALE_ORDER_ID, u.SALE_ORDER_NO, u.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, u.GOODS_ORDER_NO, u.TAX_RATE, u.NO_TAX_DECT_PRICE, u.NO_TAX_DECT_AMOUNT , u.TAX_AMOUNT , a.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO, a.SPCL_SPEC_REMARK from DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH a on u.SPCL_TECH_ID = a.SPCL_TECH_ID
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL( STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL_ID, STOREIN_NOTICE_ID, STOREIN_STORE_ID, STOREIN_STORE_NO, STOREIN_STORE_NAME, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, PRD_COLOR, BRAND, STD_UNIT, PRICE, DECT_RATE, DECT_PRICE, NOTICE_NUM, DECT_AMOUNT, DEL_FLAG, REMARK, GOODS_ORDER_NO, SPCL_TECH_ID, TAX_RATE, NO_TAX_DECT_PRICE, NO_TAX_DECT_AMOUNT, TAX_AMOUNT )values( #STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL_ID#, #STOREIN_NOTICE_ID#, #STOREIN_STORE_ID#, #STOREIN_STORE_NO#, #STOREIN_STORE_NAME#, #PRD_ID#, #PRD_NO#, #PRD_NAME#, #PRD_SPEC#, #PRD_COLOR#, #BRAND#, #STD_UNIT#, #PRICE#, #DECT_RATE#, #DECT_PRICE#, #NOTICE_NUM#, #DECT_AMOUNT#, #DEL_FLAG#, #REMARK#, #GOODS_ORDER_NO#, #SPCL_TECH_ID#, #TAX_RATE#, #NO_TAX_DECT_PRICE#, #NO_TAX_DECT_AMOUNT#, #TAX_AMOUNT# )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL
STOREIN_STORE_ID = #STOREIN_STORE_ID# STOREIN_STORE_NO = #STOREIN_STORE_NO# STOREIN_STORE_NAME = #STOREIN_STORE_NAME# PRD_ID = #PRD_ID# PRD_NO = #PRD_NO# PRD_NAME = #PRD_NAME# PRD_SPEC = #PRD_SPEC# PRD_COLOR = #PRD_COLOR# BRAND = #BRAND# STD_UNIT = #STD_UNIT# PRICE = #PRICE# DECT_RATE = #DECT_RATE# DECT_PRICE = #DECT_PRICE# NOTICE_NUM = #NOTICE_NUM# DECT_AMOUNT = #DECT_AMOUNT# REMARK = #REMARK# SPCL_TECH_ID = #SPCL_TECH_ID# TAX_RATE = #TAX_RATE# NO_TAX_DECT_PRICE = #NO_TAX_DECT_PRICE# NO_TAX_DECT_AMOUNT = #NO_TAX_DECT_AMOUNT# TAX_AMOUNT = #TAX_AMOUNT# GOODS_ORDER_NO = #GOODS_ORDER_NO#
where STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL_ID = #STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL_ID in ($STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL_IDS$)
update DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where STOREIN_NOTICE_ID = #STOREIN_NOTICE_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select distinct sto.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID, sto.STOREIN_NOTICE_NO, sto.BILL_TYPE, sto.SEND_CHANN_ID, sto.SEND_CHANN_NO, sto.SEND_CHANN_NAME, sto.RECV_CHANN_ID, sto.RECV_CHANN_NO, sto.RECV_CHANN_NAME, sto.REMARK, dtl.STOREIN_STORE_ID, dtl.STOREIN_STORE_NO, dtl.STOREIN_STORE_NAME, st.STORAGE_FLAG, sto.ORDER_CHANN_ID, sto.ORDER_CHANN_NO, sto.ORDER_CHANN_NAME from DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE sto left join DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL dtl on sto.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID = dtl.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID left join DRP_STORE st on dtl.STOREIN_STORE_ID = st.STORE_ID where sto.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID = #STOREIN_NOTICE_ID#

select dtl.STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL_ID, dtl.PRD_ID,dtl.PRD_NO, dtl.PRD_NAME, dtl.PRD_SPEC, dtl.PRD_COLOR, dtl.BRAND, dtl.STD_UNIT, dtl.NOTICE_NUM, dtl.REMARK, dtl.PRICE, dtl.DECT_RATE, dtl.DECT_PRICE, dtl.DECT_AMOUNT, dtl.SPCL_TECH_ID, dtl.GOODS_ORDER_NO, dtl.SALE_ORDER_ID, dtl.SALE_ORDER_NO, dtl.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID from drp_storein_notice_dtl dtl where dtl.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID = #STOREIN_NOTICE_ID# and dtl.STOREIN_STORE_ID = #STOREIN_STORE_ID# and dtl.DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG#
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_STOREIN( STOREIN_ID, STOREIN_NO, BILL_TYPE, FROM_BILL_ID, FROM_BILL_NO, SEND_CHANN_ID, SEND_CHANN_NO, SEND_CHANN_NAME, RECV_CHANN_ID, RECV_CHANN_NO, RECV_CHANN_NAME, STOREIN_STORE_ID, STOREIN_STORE_NO, STOREIN_STORE_NAME, STORAGE_FLAG, STATE, REMARK, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG, DEAL_FLAG, YEAR_MONTH, ORDER_CHANN_ID, ORDER_CHANN_NO, ORDER_CHANN_NAME )values( #STOREIN_ID#, #STOREIN_NO#, #BILL_TYPE#, #FROM_BILL_ID#, #FROM_BILL_NO#, #SEND_CHANN_ID#, #SEND_CHANN_NO#, #SEND_CHANN_NAME#, #RECV_CHANN_ID#, #RECV_CHANN_NO#, #RECV_CHANN_NAME#, #STOREIN_STORE_ID#, #STOREIN_STORE_NO#, #STOREIN_STORE_NAME#, #STORAGE_FLAG#, #STATE#, #REMARK#, #CREATOR#, #CRE_NAME#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #DEL_FLAG#, #DEAL_FLAG#, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy/mm'), #ORDER_CHANN_ID#, #ORDER_CHANN_NO#, #ORDER_CHANN_NAME# )

insert into DRP_STOREIN_DTL( STOREIN_DTL_ID, STOREIN_ID, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, PRD_COLOR, BRAND, STD_UNIT, NOTICE_NUM, REMARK, PRICE, DECT_RATE, DECT_PRICE, DECT_AMOUNT, DEL_FLAG, FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, YEAR_MONTH, INS_FLAG, SPCL_TECH_ID, GOODS_ORDER_NO, SALE_ORDER_ID, SALE_ORDER_NO, SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID )values( #STOREIN_DTL_ID#, #STOREIN_ID#, #PRD_ID#, #PRD_NO#, #PRD_NAME#, #PRD_SPEC#, #PRD_COLOR#, #BRAND#, #STD_UNIT#, #NOTICE_NUM#, #REMARK#, #PRICE#, #DECT_RATE#, #DECT_PRICE#, #DECT_AMOUNT#, #DEL_FLAG#, #FROM_BILL_DTL_ID#, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy/mm'), #INS_FLAG#, #SPCL_TECH_ID#, #GOODS_ORDER_NO#, #SALE_ORDER_ID#, #SALE_ORDER_NO#, #SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ERP_DELIVER_ORDER t SET t.STATE = '已收货' WHERE t.DELIVER_ORDER_ID = (SELECT f.FROM_BILL_ID FROM DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE f WHERE f.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID = #STOREIN_NOTICE_ID#)
sqlMap.select: select STATE from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER where FROM_BILL_ID=#STOREIN_NOTICE_ID# and DEL_FLAG=0 for update
sqlMap.update: update DRP_STOREIN_DTL a set (a.NOTICE_NUM, a.DECT_AMOUNT) = (select b.NOTICE_NUM, b.DECT_AMOUNT from DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL b where b.STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL_ID = a.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID and b.DEL_FLAG = 0 and b.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID = #STOREIN_NOTICE_ID#) where a.DEL_FLAG = 0 and a.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID in (select b.STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL_ID from DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL b where b.DEL_FLAG = 0 and b.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID = #STOREIN_NOTICE_ID#)
